description: {"blocks":[{"key":"achjd","text":"This protocol has been successfully used with Botrylloides diegensis and has been adapted from the following publication: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jin","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q74u","text":"An efficient low-cost laboratory workflow for the study of blood cells and RNA extractions in marine invertebrates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":114}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3EC28540802A11ECAD6517439CD72C7F","url":"https://www.preprints.org/manuscript/202103.0030/v1"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ijfo","text":"Change gloves frequently, particularly as the protocol progresses from crude extracts to more purified materials. Use sterile tubes. Perform all steps on ice and use RNAse-free water unless otherwise stated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"209r5","text":"Liquid nitrogen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"729be","text":"Sterile tubes and plastic pestles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4j3o","text":"Extraction buffer :  0.2M Tris-HCl pH 7.5 , 0.1M LiCl, 5mM EDTA, 1/10 of the total volume of SDS 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77is8","text":"Phenol pH 4 (4 C) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"131c3","text":"Chloroform","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bfgg","text":"LiCl (for 50mL: 12.6g 6M LiCl ; 6.3g 3M LiCl) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p62v","text":"SC-EtOH: Sodium acetate + 100% Ethanol (1/3 : 2/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1u3p","text":"70% and 100% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q00h","text":"RNase-free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6l04j","text":"Clean the slide from which you will take the colony of your interest. See Cleaning colonial ascidians.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":27}],"data":{}},{"key":"2qii","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3EF2865079D111ECB0A951F8ED844A7D","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.brxem7je"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ocf8","text":"Isolate a cleaned colony composed of approx. 20 zooids. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41o6s","text":"Transfer to a tube and spin at maximum speed for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f7rdh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"E85AF19079D211ECB0A951F8ED844A7D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1n1vt","text":"Remove the excess water and shock-freeze the tube in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ee1q","text":"Add   of extraction buffer to the frozen sample and macerate with a plastic pestle. {"blocks":[{"key":"8clbn","text":"Mix the tube by inversion a couple of times until it gets cloudy.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
